description:
Summary score for the Pediatric Quality of Life Inventory. [Varni, Seid, and Rode 1999 (PubMed ID: 10024117)](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/10024117/) Each item is reverse transformed from 1-4 likert scale to 100-0 score. Higher scores indicate better HRQOL (Health-Related Quality of Life). The summary score is the mean is computed as the sum of all the items over the number of items answered on all the Scales.

[Search for all PedsQL variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=pedsql)
